mapper.select: select a.id id, a.product_name productName, a.product_master_pic_path productMasterPicPath, b.price price, b.unit unit, a.product_desc productDesc, c.product_detail_master_pic_path productDetailsMasterPicPath from tb_product a, tb_product_buy_ways b, tb_product_details c where a.id = b.product_id and a.id = c.product_id and a.id = #{id}

select a.id id, a.product_name productName, a.product_master_pic_path productMasterPicPath, b.price price, b.unit unit, a.product_desc productDesc, c.product_detail_master_pic_path productDetailsMasterPicPath from tb_product a, tb_product_buy_ways b, tb_product_details c where a.id = b.product_id and a.id = c.product_id and a.category_id = #{categoryId} and a.status = 0
select id id, product_id productId, pic_path picPath from tb_product_detail_pic where product_id = #{productId}
select id id, product_id productId, level level, desc_info descInfo, created_by_date createdByDate, created_by createdBy from tb_product_review where productId = #{productId}
